alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Comal; Kendall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 2:09PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Kendall, northwestern Bexar and west central Comal Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 209 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fair Oaks Ranch, or 7 miles east of Boerne, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, Boerne, San Antonio Int Airport, Leon Valley, Helotes, Fair Oaks Ranch, Alamo Heights, Bulverde, Shavano Park, Hollywood Park, Cross Mountain, Olmos Park, The Dominion, Leon Springs, Bergheim, Timberwood Park, Government Canyon State Natural Area, Castle Hills, Balcones Heights and Hill Country Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
